content: CGWG co-chairs - Since we're off this week, perhaps we can handle this by chat? I'd like get back to the OMOP/OHDSI team this week on day for Christian Reich (OHDSI) to present on the OMOP Genomics model? From one of our meeting minutes, I recall that one of the Tuesdays in February will work. Feb 9, 16, 23? Let me know which day is best for the WG and I'll notify Christian. Thanks!
I'd vote for either Feb 16 or 23. We should have a good picture tomorrow
Thanks @Jamie Jones - I'll propose both dates to Christian.
@May Terry We just discussed this during our co-chairs call. It's definitely on the list. :-)

Closing the loop, Christian can present on Feb 16 on the OMOP Genomics CDM.

May Terry said:

Thanks Jamie Jones - I'll propose both dates to Christian.
